detaileddescription.para: SW Unit testing is accomplished through SWATT. The test cases are based on this design, and also cover the configuration options. Expected test coverage (100%) and type of test coverage (C1). For more details please see Test List.

sect1.title: Verification of Resource Consumption
sect1.para:
Estimated Resource consumption for component: The evaluation is made for DWAX_Adaptions and DWAX_MeasurementValues compositions.

sect1.title: Verification by Review
sect1.para: The review is available in git. Any points linked to JIRA tickes, see History section.

sect1.title: Verification by Testing
sect1.para: The tests are created using SWATT and are available in *.c.test files. For more details check the File section.
